Error.Retry: An error occurred. Please try again.

error_401.title: Unauthorized
error_401.content: Looks like you brought the wrong key. Try another one, purhaps?
error_401.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_401.list1: Your username or password might not be correct
error_401.list2: You need to log in to access this page

error_403.title: Forbidden
error_403.content: The cat seems to want some alone time right now Best not to bother them
error_403.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_403.list: You do not have permission to access this page.

error_404.title: Not Found
error_404.content: The cat you're looking for isn't here Maybe they’ve moved to a new home
error_404.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_404.list: The page you are looking for could not be found. Please check the URL.

error_500.title: Internal Server Error
error_500.content: The cat is too full to move Give them a moment to recover
error_500.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_500.list: An error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

error_503.title: Service Unavailable
error_503.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_503.list: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

error_504.title: Gateway Timeout
error_504.content: The cat ran as fast as they could but just couldn’t make it in time
error_504.bottomTitle: This could be caused by the following
error_504.list: The server did not respond in time. Please try again later.
